faq.name: What is a CTF?
faq.des: A Capture the Flag(CTF) is a competition for learning cyber security in a hands-on manner. Several carefully designed challenges are hosted in a safe environment for participants to experiment and develop skills in cyber security.

faq.name: What is the aim of the contest?
faq.des: With the ever-increasing growth in computer science, software protection has become an important part of any software engineering position. Participating in CTFs can help you think like an attacker and teach you how to avoid having security vulnerabilities in your code.

faq.name: How do I participate in Hackers Hour CTF?
faq.des: To participate in Hackers Hour CTF, all you need do is register your team here. Participants can register as a team. Any Individual or maximum 3 member can consist in a team.

faq.name: Is the competition suitable for beginners?
faq.des: Yes, We want the CTF to be fun for everyone, not just for those who compete for the first ranks. We encourage you to look for a team. If there is an existing team, they will hopefully introduce you to the basics of CTF playing. If there is none, you may find like-minded people to establish one!

faq.name: What is JEOPARDY-style CTF?
faq.des: Jeopardy-style CTFs are wargames that have a set of challenges in different categories of cyber security. The challenges are awarded points based on the difficulty, and a scoreboard in maintained to rank all the teams that are actively participating.

faq.name: What is a flag?
faq.des: Flag is a string of random data or text in some format. For example, THM{Y0u_g0t_th3_fl4g_}.

faq.name: What skills should we have?
faq.des: The competition will cover different topics from the area of security, e.g. web security and reverse engineering. If you don't have much previous knowledge, web security may be a good field to start. Besides that, specific domain knowledge is obviously helpful. It will certainly be helpful to have a decent understanding of (the administration of) Linux/UNIX systems and networking.

faq.name: How to become a member of The Hackers Meetup
faq.des: Fill in your details on a google form available on this link .
